description: This file declares interfaces related to warning reporting control and events within the WPEFramework project, including external references, classes, and methods used for warning event management and configuration.

classes.name: IWarningEvent
classes.description: Interface representing a warning event, providing methods for serialization, deserialization, categorization, and warning status.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit
classes.description: Interface for warning reporting units, managing warning events and category information.

classes.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl
classes.description: Nested interface managing the exclusion and configuration of warning categories.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Category
methods.description: Returns the category of the warning event.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Serialize
methods.description: Serializes the warning event data into a byte array.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::Deserialize
methods.description: Deserializes data from a byte array into a warning event.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::ToString
methods.description: Converts the warning event to a string representation.

methods.name: IWarningEvent::IsWarning
methods.description: Indicates whether the event is a warning.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::ReportWarningEvent
methods.description: Reports a warning event with a specific identifier.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::FetchCategoryInformation
methods.description: Retrieves information about a warning category.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::AddToCategoryList
methods.description: Adds a category control to the warning reporting unit.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::RemoveFromCategoryList
methods.description: Removes a category control from the warning reporting unit.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl::Exclude
methods.description: Excludes a category from warning reporting.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl::Configure
methods.description: Configures settings for a warning reporting category.

methods.name: IWarningReportingUnit::IWarningReportingControl::Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the warning reporting control.
